interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.TargetTemperature
interface.description: This interface is for setting target temperature(s) of the HAE devices such as air conditioner, refrigerator, oven, etc.

property.name: UpperActiveSetPoint
property.description: Dictionary key for a set point that the device is attempting to keep temperature below

property.name: LowerActiveSetpoint
property.description: The dictionary key for a set point that the device is attempting to keep temperature above

method.name: GetTargetTemperatures
method.description: Get target temperatures for one or more set points

arg.name: keys
arg.description: List of dictionary keys for each set point to get

method.name: SetTargetTemperatures
method.description: Set target temperatures for one or more set points

arg.name: targetTemperatures
arg.description: List of target temperatures to set
